sources.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer
sources.description: Daniel Boone leads settlers into Kentucky, but must battle Shawnee Indians who have been persuaded by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

sources.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer (1956)
sources.description: Daniel Boone leads settlers into Kentucky, but must battle Shawnee Indians who have been persuaded by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/daniel-boone-trail-blazer-1956/

sources.title: Daniel Boone, Trail Blazer (1956) BRUCE BENNETT
sources.description:
Stars: Bruce Bennett, Lon Chaney Jr., Faron Young
 Directors: Albert C. Gannaway, Ismael Rodríguez

 Daniel Boone leads settlers into Kentucky, but must battle Shawnee Indians who have been persuaded by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

metadata.Plot: Daniel Boone leads settlers into Kentucky, but must battle Shawnee Indians who have been persuaded by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.
metadata.Actors: Bruce Bennett, Lon Chaney Jr., Faron Young
